Info.Description:
E3-like Golden Path This mod changes the uniforms used by the Golden Path. Wadning: This mod [b]WILL[/b] clash with any other graphics mod which changes uniforms of the Golden Path.
Changes made by this mod: [list] [*] All Golden Path Uniforms are changed to be darker. [/list]
modded by Vinh1998. Converted to a3 format by LinkHero95.
